text: Approval for the 60 mm beta-cath 3.5f system.  The device, as modified, is indicated to deliver beta radiation to the site of successful percutaneous coronary intervention (pci) for the treatment of in-stent restenosis in native coronary arteries with discrete lesions (treatable with a 20 mm balloon for the 30 mm and 40 mm systems and injury areas up to 40 mm for the 60 mm system) in a reference vessel diameter ranging from 2.7 mm to 4.0 mm.
